trans-unit.source: Enables the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB to help make sure that a user has a security level sufficient to access an OLE DB data source.
trans-unit.target: 可讓.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB，協助確保使用者具有足夠存取 OLE DB 資料來源的安全性層級。

trans-unit.source: This class is intended for future use when the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB is enabled for partial trust scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 當部分信任案例啟用.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 時，這個類別僅供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB currently requires FullTrust permission.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 目前需要 FullTrust 權限。

trans-unit.source: Currently, using the `OleDbPermission` class has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 目前，使用`OleDbPermission`類別沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[程式碼存取安全性和 ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeration takes precedence over the <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> property.

Therefore, if you set <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> to `false`, you must also set <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to `None` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您設定<xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>至`false`，您也必須設定<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>至`None`以防止使用者進行連接，使用空白密碼。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a blank password is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否允許使用空白密碼。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的權限物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: This property has been marked as obsolete.
Setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This property has been marked as obsolete.
Setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會有任何作用。
